objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A2A3A;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2C3E50;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#D83030;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#D83030;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#D0D0D0' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#D0D0D0' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,300 C250,270 400,370 550,400 C750,440 900,390 1080,450 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,780 C150,820 350,750 550,800 C750,850 900,780 1080,850 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.03)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='rgba(255,255,255,0.05)'/><path d='M200 120 L880 120' stroke='#D83030' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/><path d='M200 960 L880 960' stroke='#D83030' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.7'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS Sensor
• Premium Metal Construction
• Versatile Interchangeable Lenses
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: FUJIFILM X-T10 - Professional-Grade Mirrorless Camera for Photography Enthusiasts
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system compatible with Fujifilm X-mount
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting adjustments
• High-performance electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Advanced autofocus system for quick and accurate focusing
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Compatible with wide range of Fujinon XF/XC lenses
• Classic black finish perfect for professional photography
• Ergonomic grip design for comfortable handling

banner_details:
This banner highlights a high-end camera product with a modern and professional design layout. The background features a smooth diagonal gradient transitioning from deep navy to rich charcoal, overlaid with softly blended red wave graphics and subtle circular patterns for visual depth. The upper left is anchored by a bold, white title identified by the `heading` text layer, paired with a vibrant red subheading (`tagline`) that indicates the product type. Key features of the camera are presented in a white bulleted list (`description`) to the left of the product image (`product_image`) showcasing the camera prominently. The price (`price`) is displayed in large, bold white text, leading to a contrasting red call-to-action button (`cta_button_background`) with white label text (`cta`) encouraging immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: #1A2A3A
- Charcoal Blue: #2C3E50
- Bold Red: #D83030
- Soft White: #FFFFFF
- Light Grey Border Stroke: #D0D0D0
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional aesthetic dominated by deep blacks and metallic highlights. The primary color is matte black (#1C1C1C), giving the camera a sophisticated and high-end look. Metallic silver accents (#C0C0C0) on control dials and lens rings add contrast and clarity, enhancing usability and drawing attention. The lens glass features subtle gradients of rich emerald green (#4DAF7C) and muted amber (#D1993D), adding a touch of elegance. These colors are harmoniously blended, yet distinct, giving the product a premium look. A matching advertisement banner should use these tones for a consistent and luxurious appeal.
